website_summaries.verdict: This top cheese plate with four tools features a well-made design that doubles as a cutting board.
pros: Numerous features make it stand out among the rest
Hardwood swivel design that opens to storage area
cons: The serving surface might be small for consumers who want to serve many cheese varieties at one time, but the convenient features make up for this small concern

customer_reviews.title: This little set is perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I am not a cook. I am the person who brings cheese with crackers, fruit & alcohol. This little set is perfect for travel. The utensils are sharp and easy to use. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because it works best only when closed. The photo implies that one can use the set when its open - but that is not the case. When open the two boards are not level. The boards rock back n forth.
customer_reviews.author: OK RACH

customer_reviews.title: Great product as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got as a gift and they were amazed as they never had seen anything like it!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Coppo

customer_reviews.title: Yes, check it before gift giving
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this and is happy with it, but she thought it was weird that it was engraved with the Florida State University Seminoles mascot, instead of being plain like the stock photo. It would appear that the occasional cheese board has custom designs since this has been mentioned before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my son and daughter In law, as they love to entertain
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: As part of a number of items in a gift box, this is a great gift. Compact and useful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picnic
customer_reviews.text: We have used this on a couple picnics now and it is perfect for travelling and storing in a picnic basket. It's not practical for home use since we have cutting boards readily available as well as knives. But for a small picnic it works perfectly. Read my other picnic reviews to see other products we use. And let me know if they are helpful in your decisions to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Wickes

customer_reviews.title: great price great quality great service it's a very efficient ...
customer_reviews.text: great price great quality great service it's a very efficient set yet also presentable in a nice way. the quality of the equipment is satisfactory and for the price i didn't except such an artisan touch my guests loved it and it was a hit! very satisfied, since the time i wanted to present cheese in a decent way!
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Feels like good quality and everything was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Feels like good quality and everything was just as described in the picture. This is on the small/medium size so don't expect it too big. I use this all the time so it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H. Vu

customer_reviews.title: great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a very fun and good quality set. It feels just right - right size, right weight and wood look is just perfect - very wine&cheese country I would say. Wish they included a brief description on how to use each knife. And wish it would be a bit easier to open the storage unit, which is a great feature btw on its own. For the price, you just can't pass by it!
customer_reviews.author: Ekat

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cheese loving dad for his birthday and he really enjoyed it. I paired it with some cheese from the store and give it to him as a gift. It has come in super handy a lot of the time and I'm glad I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived before Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I expected, hard to open for cutlery
customer_reviews.author: Terry Spangler

customer_reviews.title: this is such a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is such a great buy for the price. The wood is nice and sturdy, and so are the knives. This is also a very attractive and functional item. The one thing I wish were better is the sharpness of the knives. They are a little too dull for some cheeses. But overall this is excellent and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lamski

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is outstanding and price is exceptional. Was great for a wine tasting picnic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Bought it as a gift for a housewarming - the bamboo wood was subpar, the finishing was rough. I successfully removed a few splinters and even after that it didn't look good enough to give to someone. The set itself is great, size is good too but the materials feel very very cheap including the steel. Wanted to love it after reading so many good reviews and expected better.
customer_reviews.author: kmt

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new - Received new?
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when it came in.. it looks so cool! Wonderful gift idea.. but the one I received was clearly used. The tools were not clean and the board had obvious cut marks.
customer_reviews.author: Ck Cone

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Not of good quality, hard to open, not what expectedmtomlate to return
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Christmas gift exchange. The item that arrived was as described and as pictured. Really cute idea! May have to purchase for myself.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineNicole

customer_reviews.title: the knives work great, and it's convenient that they are stored within ...
customer_reviews.text: the knives work great, and it's convenient that they are stored within the board, but the surface area is small to serve more than two blocks of cheese. Easy to clean, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it. It is exactly as expected. The board and all cutting tools are good quality. The only suggestion would be to allow the top and bottom to detach and reattach for easier washing, other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Perez

customer_reviews.title: Definite yes!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little cheese set that fit perfectly in a picnic basket with some recipe books and cloth napkins for a wedding gift. Loved it! Might have to buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: MomNeedsAMinute

customer_reviews.title: Great 'Guy' Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gift for foodie son! Large size and 4 cheese tools.
customer_reviews.author: K. King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the man who insists they are "done" with the cheese......great for picnics!
customer_reviews.author: MTGurl

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cheese and apps. service
customer_reviews.text: I thought it looked pretty practical since the knives were part of the serving board. Also, it was about the right size for serving cheese-not too large or small.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice one very fancy but the quality is not that great
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Putting the knives back in is like a Tetris puzzle. The wood is a little rough too but it is functional.
customer_reviews.author: DMSN1220Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cousin's bday and he loves it. It's perfect for picnics. We fit 3 small cheese wedges on it with the knives and it was great. I wish there was a description for using the knives, though.
customer_reviews.author: jinabee77

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but a decent deal
customer_reviews.text: The cutting board is solid and useful I wanted this mostly for the tools. The cheese shaver was important. The tools metal are very thick, and not vented. The shaver slices too thick for striping thin wax. For the price I'll adapt.
customer_reviews.author: FreeDom

customer_reviews.title: Want to love but chipped before first use
customer_reviews.text: I love this board but I am so disappointed that it is chipped before the first use! I have really want to nice board without a chip.
customer_reviews.author: Lianna G.

customer_reviews.title: My friend loved it! Perfect for couples who like picnics
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for a secret Santa Party. My friend loved it! Perfect for couples who like picnics.
customer_reviews.author: JennaPM

customer_reviews.title: cheese set
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift at two different occasions and the recipients were delighted with it, especially the storage for the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Sora

customer_reviews.title: Great board for great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese board.Seems to have a good build quality and you can't beat the price.Looks good in my kitchen and I look forward to using it for a very long time. A must have for anyone who loves cheese and snacks!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: more for your money
customer_reviews.text: More than what I expected for the price. Solid construction and sleek design. Instruments seem of sturdy quality as well. Excited to give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Compact, great for entertaining really like it. Delivered on time. Sits very nicely next to my wine stack; I wish I knew what all the knives were for but I have a pretty good idea. Thanks, this product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Farfalla

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift but really like it and almost wanted to keep it for myself
customer_reviews.author: gamblingal21

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Good quality for the price. Gave it as a Christmas gift and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: bought this as a gift and it is way better then i thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift and it is way better then i thought it would be, will probably be picking one up for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to one of my friends and she loves it. The plate is a nice size and is very good quality for the price you pay. The different tools are also a good size and not too small like I worried they might be. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a nice medium-sized cheese plate.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a birthday present for my mom, who loves wine and cheese. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a family member, and liked it so much, I bought it for a friend. It is not only attractive, it makes perfect sense, the tools fit perfectly in the cutting board for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rine Bow

customer_reviews.title: NO NEED TO LOSE THE RIGHT CHEESE CUTTER
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a friend and she loved it. I really liked it too, especially with the cheese cutters so handy.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift and I have no opinion!
customer_reviews.author: T. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Time Circo Cheese Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice wooden cutting board, knives are thick & sturdy, will be taking this to family get togethers, picnics etc. I like how the knives all store inside this cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: wake up call

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great cheese board! Has all of the cheese knives included!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, and bigger than expected when looking at it in person
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Time Circo Cheese Set
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy blades are secure in solid wood handles. Quality wood. Everything fits easily in it's place. The top and bottom do not sit quite level when open.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I held out on the fifth star because I didn't get to use this - it was a gift for a family "white elephant" exchange. I can tell you everyone seemed to like it. The four knives can handle a variety of soft and hard cheeses, and they appear to be well made, with the handles properly riveted onto a full tang. No rough edges on the wood, and the hinge closes right - it looks like a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Nice utensils and wood
customer_reviews.text: While the set seems of good quality, it would be nicer if it were larger. You can't really fit a lot on this block like it has in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: P. H. Yanoshik

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a cheese-loving coworker as a gift and she loved it. She said that it washed well and worked better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This made a perfect gift for a wine and cheese basket, and stores compactly. It has space for at least three cheeses and accompaniments.
customer_reviews.author: Woodbridge Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this kind of things. It looks great and tools are made of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karelia Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Cheese set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go along with the picnic basket and am impressed with the quality of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Dana B.

customer_reviews.title: Circi Cheese Set-A Winner hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board is the perfect addition to a wine and cheese layout. The implements are there at hand .and it can be stored anywhere ready to use. the board adds a very professional look to a table. My friend who is a prize winning chef told me he would recommend it to anyone because it is so compact , and lovely to look at.handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Cool and compact
customer_reviews.text: The tools seem to be working well, and it's very portable/handy. The surface area for serving is small, you can't serve as displayed in the picture. Would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zohra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift
customer_reviews.text: The tray is perfect for what I needed it. I use it when I have guests. it looks great and very durable. The Knives work well and a great addition. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Inga Levin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. This was a gift for my fiance for ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. This was a gift for my fiance for his birthday. We both love it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: janellepi

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheese set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cheese set for use when we have company. It has been used on numerous occasions, and I am pleased with the product. It does make a nice touch to our serving table.
customer_reviews.author: snowgirl

customer_reviews.title: quality seemed decent and recipients seemed to like
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for others, quality seemed decent and recipients seemed to like it
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cheeseboard this past summer for my mother's birthday. She is a woman who has everything, so I wanted to get an gift she could put to good use and was something that she did not already have. So far, it has held up wonderfully and she uses it a few times a week. The knives are sturdy and are much bigger than most that come with cheeseboards. It can be a bit tricky to open, and you need to be careful so that you don't pinch your fingers. It's a bit on the heavy side, which means it's sturdy, but that could cause some problems for you if you plan on moving it around while entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyDo

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Item is a little smaller then I thought it would be. Over all it looks nice and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Penny S

customer_reviews.title: Great with the utensils!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little item. Definitely a fun addition to any party table. It's just a little smaller than I imagined it. Doesn't fit a lot of cheeses but still nice!
customer_reviews.author: ab152

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set, including the storage for the knives. The knives work decently well for the price and the assortment serves a wide variety of purposes for all your cheese needs!. Surface is easy to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Deepti Nahar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun little set for small apartment. Cheese lovers will like this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: so nice
customer_reviews.text: love this It was a great gift for a friend Everything is so compact and it stores really well fast shipping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good size. Easy to clean, knives are sharp and easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the cheese board and utensils that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An amazing gift for any cheese lover. At a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: aims

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my husband and he loves it! Great quality, very sharp knife set, and nice and compact!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L

customer_reviews.title: We love it! Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. We love it! Good quality for the price, and we appreciate the fact that it's so easy to store in our cramped kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: product came in perfect condition; cheese cutting utensils were constructed of quality material. excellent deal for price. Recommend highly for giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sproulee

customer_reviews.title: Time for cheese.
customer_reviews.text: I got the Picnic Time Circo Cheese Set for my husband for Christmas since what I wanted to get him wouldn't be in until after Christmas. I'm so glad I made the switch. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: teri silvanage

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Convenient. Sturdy and easy to use. I really liked it
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality on the wood and knives. Easy to clean and store. Perfect for dinner parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my secretary, she absoulutly loves it!! I am now considering purchasing one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L. Glaser

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift for a friend and we love it! Portable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend and we love it! Portable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dinner parties!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set!! My friends always love this cheese board with matching knives when they come for dinner parties!
customer_reviews.author: Stefette

customer_reviews.title: Candace
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift, and the receiver was impressed with the gift. No word on whether she has used it yet, but I liked the convenience and the price.
customer_reviews.author: CANDACE L. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a really neat cheese set. Classic cutting board with tools that are wonderful for cheese preparation. Compact for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: houston919

customer_reviews.title: I love it!! My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: Good buy!!! Quality and price wise.its very handy too and easy to store. Great for party or picnic.. I did not regret buying it
customer_reviews.author: geralyn ratilla

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got here in a timely fashion and my girlfriend loves it. Great knives for cheese lovers and very portable for on the go usage.
customer_reviews.author: James Kolbuk

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese tray and knife set!!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese set was just what I needed. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most useful items I have purchased in a long time. We eat a lot of cheese. I serve it whenever we have guests, too. Now I don't have to search for knives, because all the cheese knives are right there! And since the board is nice and thick, but not too heavy, it makes a great presentation.
customer_reviews.author: sibyll

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a cheese lover and it was a big hit! I want to buy one for myself next!
customer_reviews.author: EH2323

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: not sure we know how to use all the knives properly, but it's a really cute set.
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is novel and cute, but takes up too much space on a buffet table
customer_reviews.author: Marva C.

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love a cheese plate?
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, it comes with decent knives, you can put cheese on it... it's got it all! I'm only not giving it a 5 because it came with a big crack in it and so I had to send it back. The replacement had no crack, but is a little tight in opening. Not a really big deal, but there it is.
customer_reviews.author: Erek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheese board and tool set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the price. I looked at a lot of sets and compared prices online, and the knives plus the cheese board, are great. A lot of cheese sets don't come with the shaver for hard cheeses, but this one does. The tools are also full tang, hard metal. They don't flex and they aren't flimsy. They store conveniently in the cheese board, and the board is easily opened. There are two indents where you place your fingers to swivel it open. I would recommend this, buy it again, and also use it for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If it had arrived in good condition it would have been a great gift for my boss. However im glad i opened it before i handed it to her because it was covered in scratches and the utensils were obviously used! they had soap residue on them. I cleaned it up and kept it but ruined my gift idea. what a downer
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very good picnic necessity for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good picnic necessity for the price! The knives are appropriately sharp and sturdy, and I love how they fit conveniently in the board. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is I wish the size of the board was a bit larger - it comfortably serves 2 (maybe 3) cheese bricks, but not much room for anything else. With that said, its small size makes it easy to pop in the picnic basket for portability. We just use a larger cheese board when entertaining a crowd of guests at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lonergan

customer_reviews.title: Cheese board set.
customer_reviews.text: So nice, I might end up giving this to a cheese lover.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a gift to my fiancé in 2012 and it's still working great! Pros: Great size - not too big or small Nice assortment of tools Durable Cons: None - has held up really well to repeated use over the last year I constantly have people asking me where we got it. If you're looking for a solid, stylish set go for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, knives are sharp enough. The wood on the handles is good, not what I would call super high end, but nice. The cutting board is a good size for a couple types of cheese. Very happy with this for the price, it made a nice gift to family.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: great gift product! so nice and was very well received
customer_reviews.author: Jeun A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell by the picture how sturdy this set would be, but I'm so happy with it! I bought it to take on our vacation, for a wine and cheese party we have with friends on the trip. It was perfect! Just the right size for travel, very durable cutting board, and it hinges open and closed nicely. Just a cute little addition for our family fun, cleans up well, and stores away all the utensils in one neat package. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Chamb

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Have bought for gifts and always a surprise never get duplicated 😊
customer_reviews.author: Richard Seedle

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and handy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister and family as a gift. She said she really loves it. They like the fact that it stores the knives under the cutting board. I saw it this weekend in use and it's very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for a friend at Christmas! They loved and use it frequently. Item was as described and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute, very tender. A little smaller than what you expect, but it is well polished and the tools are of good size and look good quality
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! My wife loves it, and the fact that the tools/knives are include is an added bonus. Would definitely recommend and will buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but make sure they package the right one!
customer_reviews.text: The cheese set itself is wonderful, but the one I received had a University of Kentucky logo emblazoned on the cover. I inspected the box, and noticed there was a small sticker that indicated the same. It was too late to return it before the wedding shower, so I gave it to my friends with an explanation. We live in Gainesville, FL, and are all Gators fans, but the couple chose to keep it as a novelty.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So clever and nice I ordered a second one for myself
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered a slightly smaller version for a friend as a gift. When it came in, I knew I needed one too for my mini-rv and impromptu wine trips. Some irregular cuts (on both versions) where the shelf slides in leaves a slightly unrefined look to an otherwise well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Buji

product_meta.title: TOSCANA - a Picnic Time Brand Circo Cheese Board with Cheese Tools
product_meta.description: Color:TraditionalTOSCANA - a Picnic Time Brand Circo Cheese Board with Cheese Tools
feature_bullets: Circo swivel-style circular cheese cutting board set with 4 assorted full-tang cheese tools by Toscana, a Picnic Time brand
Features durable hardwood cheese tray /cutting board that opens to reveal the stainless steel tools nested inside
Includes full-tang cheese plane, knife/spreader, curved knife with dual pronged tip, sharp cheese knife for hard cheeses
Recessed moat along the perimeter will catch cheese brine or juice; Great for the buffet or cocktail parties
Measures 10.2 inches in diameter; Backed by the Picnic Time Family of Brands BUILT TO LAST Lifetime Guarantee

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars278 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
